00097 template<> struct arg<i>
00098 {
00099     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = i);
00100     typedef arg<BOOST_PP_INC(i)> next;
00101     BOOST_MPL_AUX_ARG_TYPEDEF(void_, tag)
00102 
00103     template<
00104           AUX_ARG_N_DEFAULT_PARAMS(typename U, void_)
00105         >
00106     struct apply
00107     {
00108         typedef BOOST_PP_CAT(U,i) type;
00109 #if !defined(__BORLANDC__) || (__BORLANDC__ > 0x561 && defined(BOOST_STRICT_CONFIG))
00110      private:
00111         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, nv = !is_void_<type>::value);
00112         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(nv);
00113 #endif
00114     };
00115 };
00116 
00117 #else
00118 
00119 template<> struct arg<-1>
00120 {
00121     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = -1);
00122     BOOST_MPL_AUX_ARG_TYPEDEF(void_, tag)
00123 
00124     template<
00125           AUX_ARG_N_DEFAULT_PARAMS(typename U, void_)
00126         >
00127     struct apply
00128     {
00129         typedef U1 type;
00130 #if !defined(__BORLANDC__) || (__BORLANDC__ > 0x561 && defined(BOOST_STRICT_CONFIG))
00131      private:
00132         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(bool, nv = !is_void_<type>::value);
